Dear All,

We are taking Digital Preservation class this semester. Part of =
the
project is to apply Heritrix to collect documents. Our project is to
pr=
eserve course materials and catalogues that are posted in Edventure
(school=
's e-learning system). In order to access all documents, login
is required.=
 

Our group's question is how to crawl through the edventure documents,
co=
nsidering that it has to be accessed after password authentication?

Thank =
you for your help.

Aryu, Rabia, Cecilia
